review: The firestick is great but my internet is to slow, so I have to upgrade my internet speed to realize the full benefits.
author: BANGER

review: Very impressive.  The ease of set up and activated to my account was great. The remote makes navigation quick, however it is a bit on the small side for big hands. We have used it daily since it arrived! All in all, glad we have it.
author: abarney

review: This is just awesome, exactly what I was looking for.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's good if you like all the junk that's on cable. I find myself going to the same few things I watch on cable. And the good stuff all costs money. Unless you pay for Hulu plus, its pay as you go. Even with huku, I still have to pay for some popular shows.
author: J. Browning

review: Just received it but I like it.
author: Matthew Holbrook

review: The fire stick was great once it got here after being on back order for almost a month.  It was an easy set up and very easy to use.
author: chococross
